episodes.title: Episode 40 Mind Control and Liberations: The Legacy of Ted Patrick's Deprogramming
episodes.description: In the 1970s, a wave of cults gained popularity, and an alarming number of people began mysteriously disappearing. Enter Ted Patrick, the controversial figure dubbed the "father of deprogramming." In this episode, I unravel the gripping story of how Patrick took matters into his own hands, employing forceful deprogramming methods to rescue individuals entangled in the clutches of these elusive groups. Join me as I explore the tumultuous landscape of the 1970s cult phenomenon, where ideology clashed with personal freedom, and the line between liberation and infringement blurred.    RESOURCES:    (8) Hare Krishna Brainwashing Debate | Ted Patrick vs Hridayananda Das Goswami - YouTube  DEPROGRAMMED directed by Mia Donovan - excerpt (youtube.com)  Ted Patrick - Wikipedia  Deprogramming - Wikipedia   MUSIC: www.storyblocks.com  MISSING: Michael John Hodge   ---   Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/frieddoe/message
